original_title: ソープで働くことになった母ちゃんの練習台になった息子 清宮飛鳥
overview: "Mom, I decided to work at a bathhouse!" Asuka decided to work at soap after having sexless with her completely dead husband. But she said so ... She has big boobs that she is proud of, but she has no experience working with soap and is not confident in sex. With this, not only Miss Soap, but even taking customers is a dream again. After her worries, Asuka urges her to cooperate with her son ...
title: Step Son Becomes A Practice Tool For His Step Mother Who Started Working As A Prostitute Asuka Kiyomiya
